member.name: M:atcWDM.atcDataSourceWDM.AddDataset(atcData.atcDataSet,atcData.atcDataSource.EnumExistAction)
member.summary: write timeseries data in dataset to wdm file
member.param: action to take if dataset with same id(dsn) already exists on wdm file

member.name: M:atcWDM.atcDataSourceWDM.WriteAttribute(atcData.atcDataSet,atcData.atcDefinedValue,System.Object)
member.summary: Write one attribute of a data set in memory to the dataset on the wdm file
member.param: Data set which the attribute applies to
member.returns: True on success, False on failure
member.remarks: Use WriteAttributes to write all attributes

member.name: M:atcWDM.atcDataSourceWDM.DsnBld(System.Int32,atcData.atcTimeseries)
member.summary: Put a new dataset in the WDM file from aTs
member.param: data set to add to WDM

member.name: M:atcWDM.atcDataSourceWDM.DsnWriteAttribute(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,atcData.atcDefinedValue)
member.summary: Write an attribute to the WDM file
member.returns: True if attribute was written OR if attribute is not in message file
member.remarks: Only attributes in WDM message file can be written to WDM files
